mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAINER_FEEDBACK (TRN_SEQ, MBR_SEQ, TRNF_CONTENT, TRNF_WRITTEN_DATE, TRNF_SUBMISSION_DUE) SELECT #{trnSeq} as TRN_SEQ, #{mbrSeq} as MBR_SEQ, #{trnfContent} as TRNF_CONTENT, SYSDATE as TRNF_WRITTEN_DATE, ADD_MONTHS(MAX(PT_LESSON_END_DATE), 1) as TRNF_SUBMISSION_DUE FROM PERSONAL_TRAINING WHERE MBR_SEQ = #{mbrSeq} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TRAINER_FEEDBACK WHERE TRN_SEQ = #{trnSeq} AND MBR_SEQ = #{mbrSeq} AND TRNF_SUBMISSION_DUE > SYSDATE )
